personalInfo.education: Midland Junior College; Oral Roberts University

tourBios.carHigh:
2013: T16th at the Times Colonist Island Savings Open.
2012: Made two cuts, finishing with a season-best at the Syncrude Boreal Open presented by AECON.
2011: Made eight cuts in 11 starts, including a season-best tie for fifth at the Seaforth Country Classic.
2010: Finished fifth at the Seaforth Country Classic.
2009: Best finish was a T4 at the Riviera Nayarit Classic.
2007: Played on other tours throughout the world. Best finish on the Canadian Tour was a T13 at the Northern California Classic.
2006: Enjoyed his best year with five top 10s, including a second-place finish at the MTS Classic. Added four more during a five-event stretch late in the year, including three inside the top four. Finished in sixth place on the Order of Merit which earned him an exemption into the Canadian Open.
2004: Represented Canada at the World Cup with teammate Stuart Anderson.
2002: Was the top Canadian at the Panama Open (T18).
2001: Teamed with Drew Symons to win the Casino de Charlevoix Cup in September.

tourBios.intlVics: (1): 2001 Casino de Charlevoix Cup [with Drew Symons] [Can].

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T4th in 2009 at the Riviera Nayarit Classic.
